body:
Hello everyone... 

Hello as some of you may know my ign is IamTheKnight2002 and i have just joined avicus and i can say that my favorite gamemode is nebula.

But you probably want to know more about my.I live Australia and some of my interest are playing chess,tennis,dota and obviously Minecraft.

I am not going to tell you everything about me but that's a brief explanation about myself hope to see you guys on line.

-IamTheKnight2002

2/10/14

title: Hello Avicus!...

replies.body:
Welcome to the Avicus Network!
And welcome to the forums! 

If you're not aware of the rules you can see them here!

avicus.net/rules

Also, if you have any questions just ask. Other players and staff will be more than happy to help!

Welcome dude!!

replies.body: Hey! Welcome to the Avicus Network! If you have any questions or concerns, don't hesitate to ask! We're here to help! Enjoy your stay! :)

replies.body: Welcome to the Avicus community! Make sure you review the rules (avicus.net/rules) and enjoy your time here!

replies.body:
Hey there! ;D

Welcome to Avicus! ^~^ If you need an assistance with any questions or concerns you may have, feel free to ask any Staff Member, as well help you! ;D 

As for that, enjoy your stay! (:
